channel.title: Comments for page "Chakra Armor"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Chakra Armor"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I'm curious, what is the new Chakra Armor image supposed to be based on? The previous image obviously looked like it was patterned after the armour the antagonists wore in the "Land of Snow" Naruto movie, but I can't imagine what the new image is supposed to be.
